featured.text: The establishment and features of a special theme park.

other.text: Others speak to more universal themes such as the primal relationship of humans to nature.

definition.en_def: The central topic or idea explored in a work of art, literature, or discussion.
definition.example: The theme of the novel revolves around the struggle for identity.
